00073 /// Spline for a joint trajectory 
00074 /// coef[0] + coef[1]*t + ... + coef[5]*t^5
00075 struct Spline
00076 {
00077   std::vector<double> coef;
00078 
00079   Spline() : coef(6, 0.0) {}
00080 };
00081 
00082 /// Joint trajectory segment
00083 struct Segment
00084  {
00085   boost::posix_time::ptime start_time;
00086   boost::posix_time::time_duration duration;
00087   Spline spline;
00088 };
00089
